text: veena dekh rahee thee vigyaapan
akhabaar mein
alag kamare mein baith kar dekhatee thee
isalie nahin ki shaadee ke bina use ab achchha nahin lagata tha
balki isalie ki vah apane maataapita kee chinta mitaana chaahatee thee
chhotee bahan rajanee ka rishta pakka ho chuka tha
ghar vaale chaah kar bhee rishta na thukara sake
paanch betiyaan theen
ek suneeta ka vivaah hee hua tha
umr mein do varsh ka antar tha sabake lekin veena thee ki use koee pasand nahin aata tha
kaheen na kaheen use koee kamee khatak jaatee thee aur iseelie vah haan nahin kahatee thee
nirmala bhee tang aa chukee thee
aakhir har maan kee chaahat hotee hai ki vah apanee putree ke lie achchhe se achchha var talaash kare
lekin veena ke maamale mein use lagane laga tha ki usakee pasand kadaapi bhee veena kee pasand nahin ho sakatee
aise mein veena kee maanakar unhonne rajanee ke rishte vaalon se yahee vaayada liya tha ki shaadee pahale veena kee karenge bas jaise bhee ho unhen saalachhah maheene prateeksha karanee padegee
ladake kee pasand thee rajanee
sabane haan kar dee

aise mein maan ko veena kee chinta satae rahatee thee iseelie usane ek din veena ko kah diya tha gusse mein kheejate hue tumhaare lie tumhaare sapanon ka raajakumaar to ab dhoondhana mujhe tedhee kheer lagata hai
svayan dhoondh kar batao tab maanoon
is par veena kuchh bolee na thee
man hee man usane kuchh thaan liya tha
isee ka parinaam tha ki har ravivaar ko vah akhabaar mein vaivaahik kaaailam ko dhyaan se dekhatee aur svayan apane pita kee taraph se patr likh detee thee
us din bhee vah dekh rahee thee vigyaapan aur aise mein hee ek vigyaapan par usakee drshti padee
na hee usane kisee se jaanane kee koshish kee ki yah aaaipareshan kis cheez ka hota hai
usane kaagaj kalam uthaee aur likhane baith gaee
patr likhate samay usake dil kee dhadakan badh gaee thee
na jaane kyon use lag raha tha ki vah usake lie suyogy var saabit hoga
vah svayan shikshika thee praeemaree skool mein aur kaaailej ka laikcharaar use apane lie achchha laga
man se bhee vah kisee aise var kee chaah karatee thee
na use koee vyaapaaree pasand tha na hee usake parivaar ko
sabhee padhelikhe the aur vyaapaar karane vaale ko apane yogy nahin maanate the
aakhir kaee log hain duniya mein jo paise ko praathamikata nahin dete
veena to yahee samajhatee thee ki paisa svayan aa jaata hai yadi vyakti shikshit ho sulajha hua ho
naukaree karane vaalon kee jeevan charya adhik achchhee hotee hai vyaapaar karane vaalon kee apeksha
kyonki vyaapaar mein achchhebure din sabhee dekhane ko mil sakate hain
naukaree mein bandheebandhaee aamadanee mein jeene kee kala svayan aa jaatee hai
patr likhakar veena ne ek baar phir padha
santusht ho gaee
ekaek na jaane kya vichaar aaya man mein ki uthakar jaldee se apane pars mein se apanee ek photo nikaal laee aur use bhee patr ke saath liphaaphe mein band kar diya
kuchh der vah liphaaphe ko dekhatee rahee phir kuchh sochakar muskuraee aur us par apana pata likh diya
pahale veena patr likhane ke baad apane pita ko de diya karatee thee
vahee liphaaphe mein band karake use daak mein daal aaya karate the
lekin na jaane kyon use aaj kisee ko bhee kuchh bhee bataane ka man nahin hua
chupachaap patr band karake usane pars mein daal liya
yahee sochakar ki agale din skool jaate samay vah svayan use daak mein daal degee
vaise bhee ravivaar ke din daak to nikalatee nahin
veena aaj apane man ko halka mahasoos kar rahee thee
kaee baar usaka man hua ki vah rajanee ko bata de
nirmala ko bata de
lekin vah chup rahee
kaheen koee meenamekh nikaalane laga pahale kee tarah to aise mein vah apana mood kharaab nahin karana chaahatee thee
aakhir shaadee use apanee pasand ke purush se karanee thee aur yahee use apanee pasand ka lag raha tha
aaj daak mein ek bada sa paiket aaya dekhakar amit ne jhapatakar use utha liya tha
vah dev ke vaivaahik vigyaapan ke sandarbh mein aae patron ka paiket tha jo ki hindustaan taims vaalon ne bheja tha
pahale to amit ka man hua ki use vah vaheen khol le
lekin phir use theek nahin laga
use lekar vah ramesh ke paas chala gaya
ramesh usake haath mein paiket dekhate hee bola lao lao inheen kee prateeksha thee
aur vah uth kar baith gaya
dev tab yoonivarsitee gaya hua tha
amit paiket ramesh kumaar ko thama kar svayan vaheen baith gaya
ekek karake sabhee patr ramesh ne dekhe
amit bhee sabhee dekhe ja raha tha
kul lagabhag pachaas patr the
usamen se keval paanch patr alag kie the ramesh ne
amit ne unamen se ek patr utha liya
usamen photo bhee tha
ladakee dekhane mein achchhee lag rahee thee
patr ek baar dubaara padha usane
phir apanee raay jaahir karane ke lie usane munh khola hee tha ki ramesh ne kahana shuroo kar diya logon ko jara bhee akl nahin hai
saaphasaaph likha tha
vigyaapan mein aaaipareshan ke baare mein
koee likhata hai kya cheez hotee hai
koee likhata hai ki kya ladake ne is vishay mein peeechadee kee hai
koee kya likhata hai koee kya
ek yahee patr hai bas jisamen is ladakee ka chitr hai isake pita ne ek bhee prashn nahin kiya
sulajha hua lagata hai yah vyakti
jab aap ek baat khol den to adhik savaalajavaab karane se behatar hai svayan hee jaanakaaree haasil kar lee jae
ramesh ko jaise vah ladakee bhee bha gaee thee aisa lag raha tha usake shabdon se vaise bhee yah vyakti achchhee post se ritaayar hua hai
sabhee bachche padhelikhe hain
koee emesasee hai koee beeesasee mein padh raha hai
svayan achchhe sarakaaree pad se ritaayar hua hai
vigyaan kitanee tarakkee kar chuka hai
aisee baaten to ab aam cheez hain
tabhee laga dev aa gaya hai
ramesh ne use apane kamare mein bula liya
dev bhee samajh gaya tha patr aae hain tabhee bulaaya hai
aakar baith gaya
ramesh ne use dekhate hue kaha pachaas ke kareeb patr hain unamen se mujhe keval ek patr theek laga hai
saath mein ladakee ka photo bhee hai
tum dekh lo
ve log deharaadoon rahate hain
ladakee eme beeed hai
teechar hai kendriy vidyaalay mein
saaree phemilee padheelikhee hai
sundar bhee hai
ramesh jaise aashvast ho chuka tha
dev ne photo dekha
achchha tha
patr par sarasaree nigaah daalee
bola aaaipareshan ke baare mein kuchh nahin poochha
are bhaee padhelikhe hain
jo baat pahale kah dee vigyaapan mein saaph likha hai
vah usase hee samajh gae hain
ramesh kumaar ne apane vichaar prakat kie
lekin hamen phir bhee khulaasa karana chaahie
dev ne apanee ichchha jaahir kee
lekin svar usaka bhee daba hua tha
yaani usako bhee ladakee achchhee lagee thee
apane anukool aur ramesh ko laga vah chaahata hai yaheen baat ban jae
haan sab khulaasa kar loonga main svayan
aaj hee patr likh deta hoon
saath hee likh doonga aaaipareshan ke vishay mein kuchh aur poochhana ho to bataen
ramesh ne kaha
behatar hoga yadi aap aaaipareshan ke vishay mein vistaar se likhenge
dev ne phir kaha
ramesh tab thoda aur gambheer ho gaya
usane dev ko samajhaane ke lahaje mein kaha dekho dev mainne duniya dekhee hai
jitana ham kisee baat ko tool denge utana hee doosaron ka shak badh jaega
aur yah shak badhe aisa main nahin chaahata
phir bhee tum chaahate ho to main likh doonga
aise naajuk maamalon mein doosaron kee maan lenee chaahie
sab theek hai
aap likh den aur jab deharaadoon jaenge main svayan bata doonga
dev ne apana nirnay sunaaya
nahin tum kuchh nahin kahoge aisa vaayada karo
saaree baat main svayan karoonga
main bada bhaee hoon tumhaara
yah mera pharj bhee hai aur mujhe kahane ka dhang bhee aata hai
phir kaha tumhen ladakee pasand hai main abhee likh raha hoon vistaar se
vishvaas na ho to padh lena
aur vahaan bhee sab baat main karoonga lekin svayan saaree sthiti samajh kar
mujhe padhane kee jaroorat nahin
aapane kah diya itana hee kaaphee hai
phir uthane ka upakram karate hue dev bola ab apane kamare mein jaata hoon
thoda aaraam kar loon
yah kahakar dev apane kamare kee taraph badh gaya
ramesh kumaar ne raahat kee saans lee
jaise usake man se koee bojh utar gaya ho
dev ke saathasaath amit bhee chala gaya
tab ramesh kumaar ne patr likhana shuroo kiya
deharaadoon mein pannaalaal ke naam
usakee ladakee veena ke sambandh ke lie
dev ke sambandh mein vistrt roop se aaaipareshan ka likhane lage phir haath rok liya
saath mein maalatee bhee baithee thee jo abhee tak chupachaap svetar bunatee huee bhaeeyon ka vaartaalaap sun rahee thee
ramesh ne usakee or dekhate hue kuchh sochana shuroo kar diya
kya soch rahe ho maalatee ne poochha jab usane dekha ki ramesh usee ko dekhate hue kuchh soch raha hai
soch raha hoon likhoon ki nahin
kya likhoon ki nahin maalatee ne prashn kiya
tab ramesh kumaar ne kaha yahee aaaipareshan ke baare mein dev ke
phir svayan raay bhee de dee
soch raha hoon likhane ka koee phaayada nahin
itana bhar likh deta hoon ki ladake ke aaaipareshan ke baare mein aur adhik poochhana hai to bejhijhak poochh sakate hain
aur jab vahaan jaoge tab maalatee ne aage kee baat sochee
tab ka tab dekh loonga
abhee javaab to aane do
ramesh ne abhee aage kee baat taal dee
dekh lo jaisee tumhaaree marjee
maalatee tatasth bhaav lie bolee  yah tum bhaeeyon ka maamala hai isamen main raay nahin dena chaahatee
marjee to oopar vaale kee hai
koshish karana hamaara kartavy hai bhaee
aur yah kah kar ramesh kumaar ne patr vaheen samaapt kar diya
liphaaphe mein band karake usane amit ko aavaaz lagaee aur patr daal aane ke lie de diya
jab apane kisee ke dard ka prashn ho to man sab kuchh chhipaana chaahata hai
dev ka aaaipareshan aaj koee mahatv nahin rakh raha tha
kisee ke lie bhee
vah bilkul theek hai
dev itana apana hai use unhen phir se to nahin apanaana
apanaana hai kisee doosare parivaar ne
do parivaaron se nikalakar ek nae parivaar ka janm hota hai shaadee ke baad
yah parivaar kaisa hoga kal kuchh aur ho gaya to is nae parivaar ka kya hoga
isakee kisee ko chinta nahin
aaj yah parivaar bas jae
usase aage koee nahin sochana chaahata
patr ka javaab bhee chand dinon mein aa gaya
pannaalaal ne unhen deharaadoon aakar ladakee dekhane ka nimantran diya tha
haan yah baat amit ne jaroor not kar lee thee ki pahale patr kee hastalipi aur is patr kee hastalipi mein antar tha
tab usane hansate hue kaha tha ramesha ko lagata hai pahala patr ladakee ne svayan likha tha apane pita kee taraph se aur is baar usake pita ne likha hai svayan
aur vaastavikata bhee yahee thee
lekin yah koee asaadhaaran baat nahin thee ki bahas chhidatee
sabane aane vaale ravivaar ko deharaadoon jaane ka prograam bana liya
aur isee aashay kee taar ramesh kumaar ne deharaadoon bhijava dee
khaana veena ne un logon ke saath hee khaaya
usane kaee baar mahasoos kiya ki dev raharah kar kanakhiyon se use dekh raha hai
vah lajaasee gaee thee
kuchh adhik nahin bol paee thee
vaise bhee vah apane kaam se kaam rakhane vaalee thee
ghar mein bhee jyaada nahin bolatee thee
suneeta ke saath usake sambandh sakhiyon jaise the
bas usee se apane man kee baat kahatee thee
aur sabase nijee baaten nahin karatee thee
ghareloo ladakee thee aur skool se aane ke baad sada maan ke kaamon mein haath bantaatee thee
ghar ka vaataavaran bhee ek sushikshit madhyam vargeey parivaar jaisa tha
tadakabhadak mein ooparee dikhaave mein koee vishvaas nahin rakhata tha
maataapita bhaeebhahan sabhee shikshit the lekin saadagee se rahana sabhee kee visheshata thee
maataapita ne shuroo se hee bachchon ko aisee seekh dee thee ki kabhee kisee ko jhidakane kee samajhaane kee avashyakata nahin padee thee
mookanushaasan mein rahata hua parivaar aasapados vaalon ke lie sukhad udaaharan tha iseelie aasapados vaalon kee drshti har samay unakee gatividhiyon par tikee rahatee thee
aaj bhee to pados kee thaapa aantee subahasubah hee bahaana bana kar unake ghar aa gaee theen
tab nirmala ne unhen bata diya ki veena ko dekhane kuchh log dillee se aa rahe hain aur yah sunakar misez thaapa vaheen ruk gaee thee sab thaah lene ko
iseelie aaj rasoee mein aur kisee ko jaane kee aavashyakata nahin padee
nirmala aur misez thaapa ne milakar saara khaana bana liya tha
aur aise mein khaane ke samay bhee misez thaapa ghar ke sadasyon ke beech ek sadasy see banee viraajamaan theen
dev ko bhee laga ki ghar ke sabhee bachche misez thaapa ko koee mahatv nahin de rahe hain
haan vah svayan khaana khaate samay nirmala devee ko kuchhakuchh kahatee ja rahee thee
aur iseelie dev ko lag raha tha ki khaane ke baad hone vaalee baaton mein bhee misez thaapa hee pahal karengee
usaka anumaan sahee nikala
hamaare lie yahee teeka hai
usakee yah baat sunakar ghar ke sabhee sadasy prasann ho gae
tabhee dev ne ramesh ko aankhon hee aankhon mein kuchh kaha
ramesh usaka matalab samajhakar bola achchha rahega yadi ham log kuchh der ladakaaladakee donon ko baat karane den
tab uthane ka upakram karate hue usane pannaalaal se kaha aaeee gupta jee ham log baahar chalate hain
tab pramod ramesh amit uth gae
pannaalaal va prem unake saath baahar aa gae baraamade mein
ramesh dheere se pannaalaal ko saath lekar ek kone mein khade hokar idharudhar kee baaten karane laga
pannaalaal se ramesh kee kya baaten huee
dev ko nahin maaloom
use vishvaas tha ki vah unhen usakee saaree sthiti samajha denge
dev svayan veena se kuchh kahana chaahata tha
lekin baat vah kis tarah se shuroo kare use samajh nahin aa raha tha
aakhir saahas karake usane veena se kaha  aap ko kuchh poochhana ho mere vishay mein to bejhijhak poochh leejie
veena ne pal bhar socha phir bolee  aapake vishay mein sab kuchh to pata hai aur kya poochhana
dev itana hee poochhakar aashvast ho gaya
is vishvaas mein usane kuchh aur poochhana uchit nahin samajha
yah ek aam kamajoree hai purush kee apanee kamee ka khulaasa saralata se nahin kar paata
sach ko ghumaaphira kar kahana hee use achchha lagata hai
aur ladakee ke maamale mein yadi vah pasand ho to haasil karane mein apanee kamee chhupaanee hee behatar samajhata hai
